lyrics:
5 contributorslongneck way to go lyricschorus mark wystrach
ive got a long longneck way to go
well these heartbreak beers they go down fast
but this gettin over you is goin down slow
and its closin in on closin time and i aint even close
ive got a long longneck way to go

verse 1 jon pardi
keep em cold keep em comin
bartender dont tell me im runnin outta time
if these tears keep fallin
well last call just might last all night

chorus jon pardi
i got a long longneck way to go
well these heartbreak beers they go down fast
but this gettin over yous sure goin down slow
and its closin in on closin time and i aint even close
ive got a long longneck way to go

bridge mark wystrach jon pardi
well i thought a couple rounds might do the trick
but youre still on my mind
and i lost count after five or six
now its 2 am and im still buyin
see midland liveget tickets as low as 57you might also likeverse 2 jon pardi mark wystrach
got a tab keep it open
cause im still drinkin and im still hopin
to drown your memory
aw but its got a pretty tight grip on me

chorus jon pardi mark wystrach both
i got a long longneck way to go
well these heartbreak beers they go down fast
but this gettin over yous sure goin down slow
man its closin in on closin time and i aint even close
ive got a long longneck way to go
yeah i sure got a long longneck way to goembed
